quote: REALTORS think Instagram is a place to show off, but it's really about building personal connections.
why_clipworthy: Challenges the conventional view of Instagram as a purely promotional tool.
suggested_hook: Are you using Instagram to show off or to connect?

quote: Don't have an automated message in your DMs. It turns people off and you miss genuine engagement opportunities.
why_clipworthy: Provides a specific tactic to improve engagement.
suggested_hook: Why automated DMs might be costing you clients.
